content: प्रश्नः [प्रच्छ्-भावे नङ्] {@--1@} A question, query; an inquiry, interrogation (अविज्ञातप्रवचनं प्रश्न इत्यभिधीयते); अनामयप्रश्नपूर्वकं <ls>Ś. 5</ls> ‘with an inquiry about (your) well-being or health’. {@--2@} A judicial inquiry or investigation. {@--3@} A point at issue, a subject of controversy, controverted or disputed point; इति प्रश्न उपस्थितः. {@--4@} A problem for solution or calculation; अहं ते प्रश्नं दास्यामि <ls>Mk. 5.</ls> {@--5@} Inquiry into the future. {@--6@} A short section of a work. {@--7@} Basket-work.
